data.description:
Waiting for a holiday is a thing of the past. Escape to the beach today! Catch your breath, be in the moment and connect with your soul. Never-ending real 360˚ beaches from around the world with real time audio. Realize the benefits of short powerful gratitude meditations (2-4 minutes). 

Staring at the ocean changes our brain waves’ frequency and puts us into a meditative state. Immersive virtual nature reduces anxiety, fatigue, depression and increases relaxation. 

The feeling of gratitude has life-changing benefits. 

“It regulates stress hormones, helps with cognitive restructuring, enhances the production of serotonin and dopamine neurotransmitters, and fires new neural connections to the “bliss” centre of our brain.” (Christina Costa, Psychologist)

Watch a short tutorial inside the app for hand controller direction, only the right controller with two easy functions.

REVIEWS FROM OUR FOCUS GROUPS

“Fabulous, love that I am on a beach in some remote parts of the world in seconds. It really feels like I am there. Mindblowing!” -- Dan

"PraiaVR is a welcome app to provide an “escape”, just beautiful and perfect - the beaches ground me. Love it!!" — Lisa

"The sounds of the sea breaking on the shore made me relax when I thought I was relaxed. Wonderful experience." — Eleanor

"So very cool - traveling without having to travel."  — Melissa

"I want to meditate outside but am bothered by bugs, sand, wind ...this is a game changer. Love it."
